transcript: one of our editors were looking at a short video that they were like man I really thought this was a good video and it totally tanked it got like 4,000 views which for us was a tank they looked at it made some notes and all they did was they chopped the first 5 Seconds basically just readed the first 5 Seconds of the video and that one change took it from 4,000 views to 850,000 views with that one change that's a 200x increase from one change which is how people framed the value that they were about to consume if the first 5 seconds is what immediately sorts 80 90% of the traffic that you have then isn't it crazy that we don't spend more time testing that one piece is
